answers.answer: Did anyone have to get pain meds through their iv after getting the ctyotec?
I was induced but by putting pitocin and I was only dialated 2cm it I was in labor for 24 hours
I was induced with pitocin at 37 weeks due to preeclampsia also and I wasn't dialated at all either...I was only in labor 14 hours I got pain meds thru my iv but I refused to get an epidural

question: So tomorrow night I'm getting cytotec or whatever that pill is called inserted vaginally to soften my cervix then Tuesday morning they are going to start the pitocin drip on me to induce me bc I have pre eclampsia. I'll be 37 weeks tomorrow. I'm not dilated at all..Has anyone else been induced this way?The doctor said it would probably be a lengthy procedure since I'm not dilated or anything yet n this is my first baby..how were your experiences?
title: induction
